survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Home Air Quality Monitoring Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding smart home air quality monitoring systems, including features, usability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with smart home air quality monitoring systems?
answer_options: Very familiar - I own and use one regularly
Somewhat familiar - I know about them but do not own one
Not very familiar - I have heard of them but know little
Not at all familiar - I have never heard of them before
